title: Add Exponential Backoff to Widget Verification Polling
message: QA BLOCKED: Main branch has unresolved merge conflicts preventing dashboard from compiling. Feature code inspection shows correct implementation, but browser testing cannot proceed.

blocker_details.summary: 7 files contain git merge conflict markers (<<<<<<< HEAD), preventing dashboard compilation
blocker_details.impact: All UI ticket QA blocked until resolved

acceptance_criteria: ✅ AC5: After 10 min, polling stops and shows button (line 118, lines 158-183)
✅ AC6: Button click triggers check and resumes polling (lines 75-86)

test_user.status: Created but could not log in

required_action.what: Resolve merge conflicts in main branch
required_action.why: Dashboard won't compile, preventing all browser-based QA testing
steps: 1. Review and resolve conflicts in 7 files listed above

requeue_after: Merge conflicts resolved and dashboard compiles successfully
pm_note: Feature implementation looks correct based on code inspection. This is purely an infrastructure blocker preventing final verification via browser testing. Once conflicts are resolved, QA can complete quickly.
